messages.content: Given a sports headline, provide the following fields in a JSON dict, where applicable: "player" (full name), "team", "sport", and "gender".
Sources: Colts grant RB Taylor OK to seek trade
{"player": "Jonathan Taylor", "team": "Colts", "sport": "football", "gender": "male" }
